A LINQ-enabled object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用資料繫結案例[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]，且無法建立從具型別或不具類型的，提供該資料表的預設檢視。 enables data-binding scenarios for [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] and can be created from a typed or untyped , providing a default view of that table. 在您已經從 中建立 之後，就可以針對它設定篩選和排序。Filtering and sorting can be set on the after it has been created from a . 會接著繫結至 UI 控制項，例如或，以便提供簡單資料繫結模型。The is then bound to a UI control, such as a or a , providing a simple data binding model. 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[建立 DataView 物件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-dataview-object-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information and examples, see [Creating a DataView Object](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-dataview-object-linq-to-dataset.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立從 SalesOrderDetail 資料表，然後將它設定為資料來源的物件做為 proxy控制項：The following example creates a from the SalesOrderDetail table and sets it as the data source of a object, which acts as a proxy for a control: [!code-csharp[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromTable](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/CS/Form1.cs#createldvfromtable)] [!code-vb[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromTable](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/VB/Form1.vb#createldvfromtable)]

span.span: Creates and returns a LINQ-enabled object representing the [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query.
A LINQ-enabled object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用資料繫結案例[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]，且無法建立從[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查詢。 enables data binding scenarios for [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] and can be created from a [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query. 代表查詢本身，而不是查詢頂端的檢視。The represents the query itself, and is not a view on top of the query. 新建立推斷篩選和排序資訊，這從建立查詢。The newly created infers the filtering and sorting information from the query it is created from. 會接著繫結至 UI 控制項，例如或，以便提供簡單的資料繫結模型。The is then bound to a UI control, such as a or a , providing a simple data-binding model. 參數`T`輸入參數的`source`的型別只能是或型別衍生自。The parameter `T` of the input parameter `source` can only be of type or a type derived from . 下列查詢運算子，僅支援在查詢中用來建立:The following query operators, only, are supported in a query used to create : - - - - - - - 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[建立 DataView 物件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-dataview-object-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information and examples, see [Creating a DataView Object](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-dataview-object-linq-to-dataset.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立的線上依總金額的訂單：The following example creates a of online orders ordered by total due: [!code-csharp[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/CS/Form1.cs#createldvfromquery1)] [!code-vb[DP DataView Samples#CreateLDVFromQuery1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP DataView Samples/VB/Form1.vb#createldvfromquery1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] 實作的資料來源上的查詢運作介面或介面。 queries work on data sources that implement the interface or the interface. 類別未實作任何一種介面，因此您必須呼叫方法，以使用中作為來源`From`子句[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]查詢。The class does not implement either interface, so you must call the method to use the as a source in the `From` clause of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query. 您也可以如取得自訂的網域特定運算子，藉由傳回物件。You can also obtain custom, domain-specific operators, such as , by returning an object. 所傳回的可列舉物件方法永久繫結至，所產生。The enumerable object returned by the method is permanently bound to the that produced it. 多個呼叫方法會傳回多個獨立的可查詢物件的所有繫結至來源。Multiple calls to the method will return multiple, independent queryable objects that are all bound to the source . ## Examples 在下列範例中，`DisplayProducts`方法會接收 DataTable，其中包含名為 DataColumn `ProductName`，擷取`ProductName`值並再印出。In the following sample, the `DisplayProducts` method receives a DataTable that contains a DataColumn named `ProductName`, extracts the `ProductName` values and then prints the values. [!code-csharp[system.data.DataTableExtensions.AsEnumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.data.datatableextensions.asenumerable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[system.data.DataTableExtensions.AsEnumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.data.datatableextensions.asenumerable/vb/source.vb#1)]

returns.span: A that contains the input sequence as the type of objects.

span.span: A that contains the input sequence as the type of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數`T`輸入參數的`source`的型別只能是或型別衍生自。The parameter `T` of the input parameter `source` can only be of type or a type derived from . 輸入的序列可以是任何來源，不僅查詢透過。The input sequence can be any source, not only a query or a query over a . 請注意，是否來源序列是查詢，呼叫這個運算子會強制立即執行。Note that if the source sequence is a query, calling this operator will force immediate execution. 列舉來源序列，也可能導致系統擲回的例外狀況。Enumerating the source sequence can also cause exceptions to be thrown. 目的地資料表的結構描述根據第一個結構描述來源序列中的資料列。The schema of the destination table is based on the schema of the first row in the source sequence. 資料表中繼資料擷取自中繼資料和資料表中的資料行值的值。The table metadata is extracted from the metadata and the table values from the column values of the . 針對具型別的，不會保留型別。For a typed , types are not preserved. 傳送資料和結構描述，但產生的輸出資料表的資料列不會具類型的型別。The data and schema are transferred, but the resulting rows of the output table will not be of the typed type. 和屬性不會保留期間從來源複製傳回。The and properties are not preserved during the copy from the source to the returned . 當**null**參考或值是 null 的型別**null**位於來源，這個方法會取代目的地中的值值是。When a **null** reference or nullable type with a value of **null** is found in a source , this method replaces the value in the destination with a value of . 所產生之方法所傳回之資料表具有預設的資料表名稱。The generated table returned by the method has the default table name. 如果您想要命名，將其附加至，或執行任何其他特定作業，必須這麼做之後，資料表會建立並傳回。If you want to name the , attach it to a , or perform any other specific operation, you must do so after the table is created and returned. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[建立 DataTable 從查詢](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Creating a DataTable From a Query](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md). ## Examples 下例會 2001 年 8 月 8 日之後會查詢 SalesOrderHeader 資料表的訂單，並使用方法來建立從該查詢。The following example queries the SalesOrderHeader table for orders after August 8, 2001, and uses the method to create a from that query. 接著， 便繫結至 ，而它會當做 的 Proxy。The is then bound to a , which acts as proxy for a . [!code-csharp[DP LINQ to DataSet Examples#CopyToDataTable1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP LINQ to DataSet Examples/CS/Program.cs#copytodatatable1)] [!code-vb[DP LINQ to DataSet Examples#CopyToDataTable1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DP LINQ to DataSet Examples/VB/Module1.vb#copytodatatable1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數`T`輸入參數的`source`的型別只能是，或從其衍生類型。The parameter `T` of the input parameter `source` can only be of type , or a type derived from . 輸入的序列可以是任何來源時，不僅查詢透過。The input sequence can be any source, not only a query over a . 請注意，是否來源序列是查詢，呼叫這個運算子會強制立即執行。Note that if the source sequence is a query, calling this operator will force immediate execution. 列舉來源序列，也可能導致系統擲回的例外狀況。Enumerating the source sequence can also cause exceptions to be thrown. 目的地資料表的結構描述根據第一個結構描述來源序列中的資料列。The schema of the destination table is based on the schema of the first row in the source sequence. 資料表中繼資料擷取自中繼資料和資料表中的資料行值的值。The table metadata is extracted from the metadata and the table values from the column values of the . 針對具型別的，不會保留型別。For a typed , types are not preserved. 傳送資料和結構描述，但產生的輸出資料表的資料列不會具類型的型別。The data and schema are transferred, but the resulting rows of the output table will not be of the typed type. 和屬性不會保留期間從來源複製傳回。The and properties are not preserved during the copy from the source to the returned . 當**null**參考或值是 null 的型別**null**位於來源，這個方法會取代目的地中的值值是。When a **null** reference or nullable type with a value of **null** is found in a source , this method replaces the value in the destination with a value of . 所產生之方法所傳回之資料表具有預設的資料表名稱。The generated table returned by the method has the default table name. 如果您想要命名，將其附加至，或執行任何其他特定作業，必須這麼做之後，資料表會建立並傳回。If you want to name the , attach it to a , or perform any other specific operation, you must do so after the table is created and returned. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[建立 DataTable 從查詢](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Creating a DataTable From a Query](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數`T`輸入參數的`source`的型別只能是，或從其衍生類型。The parameter `T` of the input parameter `source` can only be of type , or a type derived from . 輸入的序列可以是任何來源時，不僅查詢透過。The input sequence can be any source, not only a query over a . 請注意，是否來源序列是查詢，呼叫這個運算子會強制立即執行。Note that if the source sequence is a query, calling this operator will force immediate execution. 列舉來源序列，也可能導致系統擲回的例外狀況。Enumerating the source sequence can also cause exceptions to be thrown. 目的地資料表的結構描述根據第一個結構描述來源序列中的資料列。The schema of the destination table is based on the schema of the first row in the source sequence. 資料表中繼資料擷取自中繼資料和資料表中的資料行值的值。The table metadata is extracted from the metadata and the table values from the column values of the . 針對具型別的，不會保留型別。For a typed , types are not preserved. 傳送資料和結構描述，但產生的輸出資料表的資料列不會具類型的型別。The data and schema are transferred, but the resulting rows of the output table will not be of the typed type. 和屬性不會保留期間從來源複製傳回。The and properties are not preserved during the copy from the source to the returned . 當**null**參考或值是 null 的型別**null**位於來源，這個方法會取代目的地中的值值是。When a **null** reference or nullable type with a value of **null** is found in a source , this method replaces the value in the destination with a value of . 所產生之方法所傳回之資料表具有預設的資料表名稱。The generated table returned by the method has the default table name. 如果您想要命名，將其附加至，或執行任何其他特定作業，必須這麼做之後，資料表會建立並傳回。If you want to name the , attach it to a , or perform any other specific operation, you must do so after the table is created and returned. 如果擲回例外狀況時的資料列複製到目標資料表，例如條件約束例外狀況`errorHandler`會呼叫委派。If an exception is thrown during the copy of a data row into the target table, such as a constraint exception, the `errorHandler` delegate is called. A傳遞至`errorHandler`委派具有下列值：A is passed to the `errorHandler` delegate with the following values: - 屬性設定為來源資料的複本。The property is set to a copy of the source data. - 屬性設為目標。The property is set to the target . - 屬性設定為攔截的例外狀況。The property is set to the caught exception. 委派呼叫傳回之後，屬性唯讀。The property is read after the delegate call returns. 如果屬性是`true`、 列舉和載入資料的資料表來源順序會繼續。If the property is `true`, the source sequence continues to be enumerated and loaded into the data table. 如果屬性是`false`，原始的例外狀況擲回從方法。If the property is `false`, the original exception is thrown from the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[建立 DataTable 從查詢](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Creating a DataTable From a Query](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/creating-a-datatable-from-a-query-linq-to-dataset.md).
